com.god.kahit.model

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.god.kahit.model.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    responsibility: This class is responsible for the store in the game. It handles the information need to buyItem items for different players.

    used-by: This class is used in the following classes: QuizGame.

                             Player player)
        A method that checks if a given player can buyItem a given item
        Parameters:
        i - the index of the item the player wishes to buyItem
        player - which player wants to buyItem an item
        Returns:
        returns if the player's score is enough to buyItem the item and if the player doesn't have an item

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        : boolean that indicates if an item is bought an the list of bought items contains it.
